products.title: Floris Mimosa Roller Blind
products.description: Bright, crisp and clean. Theres something wonderful about catching a glimpse of beautifully painted flowers that cheers up your day, no matter what the time is. The fresh nature of this blind makes it perfect for adding a cheery tone to almost any room in the home. So go on, bright, crisp and clean.

products.title: Bella Frost Roller Blind
products.description: Coastal chic just got even more fabulous with this bella frost roller blind from their harlequin additions collection. Blues are married with sand and pebble grey in a wonderful fashion. The varying sizes of the stripes help to keep the blind looking visually interesting, and m coastal chic just got even more fabulous with this bella frost roller blind from their harlequin additions collection.

products.title: Silhouette Cerise Roller Blind
products.description: As pretty as they look, not all tree designs need to be dressed in green shades, just look at this silhouette cerise roller blind. It looks absolutely gorgeous. The gentle heather and vibrant pink is set off by mustard gold, creating a palette that works wonders both in a plai as pretty as they look, not all tree designs need to be dressed in green shades, just look at this silhouette cerise roller blind.

products.title: Gardenia Olivia Roller Blind
products.description: Gardenia is a classic harlequin design, a modern take of the floral classics. Here we have it picked out in greens and greys to add some funk to your surroundings. Not only is the design nice and contemporary, the practicality you get with a roller blind is just perfect for gardenia is a classic harlequin design, a modern take of the floral classics.

products.title: Silhouette Peacock Roller Blind
products.description: Create a fun-loving, bright and breezy space that oozes pops of colour with their silhouette peacock roller blind. Harlequin used unexpected colour combinations with this design and we just couldnt discard this. Instead, weve given it extra vibrancy and made it part of their create a fun-loving, bright and breezy space that oozes pops of colour with their silhouette peacock roller blind.

products.title: Innocence, Nimbus - Roller Blind
products.description: Light and translucent, the innocence numbus is a gentle grey light-filtering blind that will mute the sun's rays without blocking them out completely. The lightweight fabric is high quality and hardwearing, so this blind will keep serving its purpose year after year. Perfectly matched to the on-trend shabby chic look, the numbus will match white wicker and worn furniture in a beautifully vintage-styled bedroom.

products.title: Innocence, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: A soft, neutral blind, patterned with simply drawn, off-white ferns, the innocence in natural is quiet and unassuming. The gently light-filtering material allows just the right amount of light through, whilst still offering all of the privacy you need. Cream-coloured kitchens with a light and airy feel will benefit from the natural, which will hang discreetly amongst both stronger colours and other neutrals, making it the ideal shade for those who prefer hushed, low-key hues without any risk of colour-clashing.

products.title: Tropicana, Multi - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you who want your decor to really make a statement we give you tropicana multi. This heady mix of pastels and navy blue allows you to lose yourself in the moment like never before. Perfect if you want to feel like you're in a world all of your own. The playful natural of tropicana multi makes it an inspired choice when you want to revamp the family kitchen. With a whole new portfolio of colours and lines you'll be able to see things differently as you cook up a feast.

products.title: Ferns, Tungsten - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns tungsten takes your senses on a journey they will never forget. Whether it's the timeless stone grey, the light and breezy feel of the fabric itself, or the gentle shimmer of the stitching, you'll find something to fall in love with the moment you hang your new blinds. Adding in woody browns and sandy beiges is a great way to create a natural symphony of colour that you'll take pride in looking at every time you come home.

products.title: Prism, Entice - Roller Blind
products.description: Cool and calm, the prism entice will indeed entice your eyes, drawing them in to this lovely window feature. Muted dark blues take centre stage, quietly complemented by off-whites and dusky light blues, and the creamy white background allows plenty of light through to show the colours off. Design a calming atmosphere in the guest bedroom by placing the entice amongst cream-white walls and accenting ornaments.

products.title: Crosshatch, Sea Urchin - Roller Blind
products.description: Imagine a world without sea urchin from the crosshatch collection. It would be devoid of colour and retro patterning - two things you never want to be without. The dreamy blue is perfect for setting your mind at ease at the end of a long day. Matching to sea urchin is all about looking for suitable reds and greens that bring simple geometric touches of style with them. Once you find them you can add that secondary layer to your decor that all great interiors have.

products.title: Crosshatch, Inkspot - Roller Blind
products.description: Inkspot is perhaps their favourite fabrics from the crosshatch range because of the way the deep moody blue allows you to lose yourself in the moment. It's a shade whose impact can be felt around the room no matter the layout of your home. When you want to celebrate the unique features of your home you need these slightly quirky touches. The blue has a regal quality that you've seen for years, but it's the slightly throwback pattern that sits underneath it that really makes a house a home.

products.title: Prism, Nutmeg - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want a fabric that combines inspirational design with a calming set of homely colours you need something just like prism nutmeg. The relaxed array of creams and beiges work in perfect harmony with the folksy and homely look of the trees. Just what you need when you're trying to make your house feel like home. Matching to nutmeg is all about embracing the browns and working in other similar shades to your room.

products.title: Crosshatch, Sandstorm - Roller Blind
products.description: Sandstorm provides a touch of natural colour combined in perfect harmony with a luxurious pattern that ticks all the right boxes. This is a fabric that means something different to different people. You might feel it's luxurious, authentic, glamorous, elegant, or a whole host of other things. What matters is you find a place for it in your home. We love the idea of using the gentle sandy colour to add a sleepy and wholesome quality to the bedroom.

products.title: Prism, Sage - Roller Blind
products.description: There aren't many colours more refreshing than a soft apple green, and that's what you get with the prism in sage, combined with pale mints and a rich cream background. Lightweight, beautifully woven fabric creates the basis for this blind, and hangs simply and elegantly when rolled down. Wake up to a calm, cheery bedroom by using the pretty green in the sage to form the foundation of your colour scheme, pairing it with creams walls, forest green accents, and medium woods.

products.title: Tropicana, Forest - Roller Blind
products.description: Tropicana forest is one of their most in-demand fabrics right now, and it's not hard to see why. The beauty of the jungle is brought to life with a portfolio of life-affirming greens that breathe life, energy, and vitality into any room in the house. As you survey the colours on offer you can quickly lose yourself in the intricacy of the visual. This is not your typical print. It's a reinterpretation of a classic look that allows you to weave in a dozen new shades and tones.

products.title: Prism, Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: Prism thunder combines a cheery and welcoming style of printing with a slightly colder and more distant colour scheme. The end result is a design that welcomes you through the door before slowing things down and taking the edge off. The light blues make this the perfect addition to the master bedroom so that you can switch off and begin to wind down. It's all about adding in other slightly faded colours like greens and browns.

products.title: Dragonfly, Tropical Sunset - Roller Blind
products.description: Tropical sunset is a blend of colours that allows you to lose yourself in the moment and celebrate the free artistic expression that brings the design to life. The calming blues and passionate pinks evoke memories of time spent outside in the sun -just what you need to brighten any day. If you want to add a statement piece to the dining room there's no better way to do it than choosing your favourite colour from tropical sunset.

products.title: Dragonfly, Lagoon - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new dragonfly lagoon fabric is guaranteed to catch the eye the moment you unroll it. If you love to celebrate the beauty of nature through an artistic lens then be prepared for an explosion of colour and texture. The way in which the greens and blues effortlessly ebb and flow into one another allows you to lose yourself in the moment like never before. Wall art is the order of the day if you want to extend the influence of lagoon around the room.

products.title: Blossom, Ice Breeze - Roller Blind
products.description: Blossom ice breeze has an icy blue background combined in perfect harmony with a lively array of greens and purples. They serve to elevate it from a fabric that calms a room, to one that brings it to life. The florals take on a life on their own the moment you take them in. As you search for ways to integrate ice breeze into your home don't forget the beauty of the natural world. If you can find new ways to view it through various artistic lenses then that's everything you need to fall in love with your home all over again.

products.title: Blossom, Blue Oar - Roller Blind
products.description: We fell in love with blue oar the moment we saw it because of the nocturnal resonance of the blue. It reminds us of seeing natural colours set against the dark evening sky - a time when the greens and pinks actually become magnified as their colourful backdrop fades to black. If you want to bottle this feeling, adding blue oar to your bathroom would be an inspired choice. It can be hard to find space for pictures and artwork in one of the more specialist spaces in the home, which means floral blinds offer a unique opportunity.

products.title: Crosshatch, Lime Zest - Roller Blind
products.description: The thing you'll notice about lime zest from their crosshatch collection is that it combines a modern energetic green with a timeless pattern that has a hint of retro style. It's a match made in decor heaven when you get down to it, and it's one that we're delighted to showcase. If you want to take your decor in a slightly retro direction then the vibe of lime zest is just what the doctor ordered.

products.title: Dragonfly, Sunset - Roller Blind
products.description: When the sun goes down there are dozen shades of orange and red that light up the sky. Dragonfly sunset allows you to embrace this symphony of colour whilst simultaneously using it to construct a visual that unifies your decor. A true touch of artistic inspiration that allows any home to look its best. As you sit and think about what to match to sunset can we suggest one thing? The electricity of the pinks allows you to work in darker shades of purple and black into your room without removing too much light and energy.

products.title: Trippy, Sunbeam - Roller Blind
products.description: Trippy sunbeam is the heady mix of striking patterning and vibrant colour that you've been looking for, and it's now available as an iconic roller blind. The lightweight fabric drifts gently in the breeze, whilst the energy of the yellow radiates around the room and fills you with energy. If you like the idea of creating the perfect high energy kitchen you need to start looking for other bright pastel colour accessories and finishing touches.

products.title: Blossom, Spring Burst - Roller Blind
products.description: Spring burst is aptly named because of the way in which the colour explodes off the fabric and catches your eye from every angle. It's a wise choice when you want to inject some energy into small compact spaces, and because of the nature of the florals it won't overpower your space either. Matching to spring burst is all about taking the pale blue as the unifying base colour and then adorning your surfaces with other artistic impressions.

products.title: Crosshatch, Clean White - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutral decor doesn't have to be plain and simple if you don't want it to be, so why settle for less? That was the thinking behind their crosshatch collection, and it's what brings clean white to life. The intricate stitching that creates the geometric pattern is truly a joy to behold. As you stand back and admire the gentle presence of clean white you can start thinking about matching options. A light cream and a darker charcoal grey are great options to explore a little further.

products.title: Blossom, Precious Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of blossom precious pink is the way in which it combines energetic greens and soothing purples to create a picture that connects with your decor. It's more than an addition, it's a starting point. This means you have the freedom to rework your colour scheme safe in the knowledge that you'll love the end result. Take the opportunity to introduce light blues and faded pinks if that's what you feel like doing.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Fired earth is more than a blackout blind that allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. It's a symphony of exotic hues that holds the keys to unlocking the full potential of your interiors. The reds and oranges are finely tempered by the strands of white that intricately weave their way through the fabric. Combine fired earth with some terracotta whenever the option presents itself and you won't be disappointed.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Snowy Mountain - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology (blackout) snowy mountain captures the colour and texture of one of the natural world's most incredible sights, and it does it all whilst creating a design that's fit for any contemporary home. products.description: Graphite is one of the must-have colours of the year which is why we've used it as the foundation for their new abyss blackout fabric. Could there be a better way to breathe new life into the master bedroom than by matching abyss with a light green bedspread?
